Summary: Yellow-Orange orb stationary in backyard at 5:00 am
divs: Sighting DetailsI awoke at 5:00 a.m. and turned my head to look out the window from my bed. I noticed that it was completely dark, as if the street lights had gone out on the street behind my backyard. I then saw a yellow-orange orb in my backyard aprox. 150-200 feet from my house. I looked at the clock and noted the time, then closed my eyes for a moment. I looked again and saw that the light was still there so I got out of bed and moved the sheer curtains aside to take a better look. I saw an orb that was yellow-orange - it was stationary in my backyard (below the tree line). It seemed a little fuzzy (or because my eyes were tired), so I closed one eye and tried to focus on it. I realized that it was not my neighbors back porch light, nor a flashlight, nor an interior light from someones house, nor a street light. It was a yellow-orange circular light in my backyard close to the ground. I was really tired, and didn't think about what else it could be, so I got back in bed and fell asleep for another 20 minutes. I then awoke at 5:30 and looked again, the orb was gone, but the street lights were once again lite on the road behind my yard. After going back to sleep, and waking at 6:30 I told my husband the story of the strange light in the backyard at 5am. It rained all day on the 19th, but I went out in the far backyard to take a look. I did not see anything out of the unusual, but then again I don't know what I'm looking for. Let me tell ya... if this happens again, I'm waking up my husband and we're going outside to research. Cause now I can't stop thinking about it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Mystic
There were no other sightings in Mystic on or around October 19th 2011
